mapper.sql: SELECT BNNR_SN as bnnrSn , ORG_CD as orgCd , BNNR_NM as bnnrNm , BNNR_URL as bnnrUrl , BNNR_POS_CD as bnnrPosCd , BNNR_ODR as bnnrOdr , BNNR_TRGT as bnnrTrgt , BNNR_IMG_SN as bnnrImgSn , BNNR_DESC as bnnrDesc , OPEN_YN as openYn , REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(REG_NO) ) AS regNm , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(MOD_NO) ) AS modNm , MOD_DTTM as modDttm FROM tb_etc_bnnr WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 베너의 전체 목록 */
ORDER BY BNNR_ODR

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 베너의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY BNNRODR
